text: Danilo T端rk (; born 19 February 1952) is a Slovenian politician. He was President of Slovenia from 2007 to 2012. In 2016, T端rk was an unsuccessful candidate for the post of Secretary-General of the United Nations. ==Other websites== *Web page of the president of Slovenia *Former presidents of Slovenia with links on their archive web pages *Office of former President Danilo T端rk *Biography *Presidential campaign site 2012 * Biography by CIDOB Foundation *Interview from December 2009 in English with transcript Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Slovenia
title: Danilo T端rk
